Posts.EditableText: I got bitched at from a bartender because i didn't tip. I only bought 2 beers and got them at the bar (had to grab beer myself) all she had to do was pour the beer and hand it to me.. Do you guys tip bartenders? Also a pint was 8$

Posts.EditableText: I tip on pick up orders, so...

Posts.EditableText: I tip for anything involving a bartender or waitress unless they go out of their way to be rude. Careful about bitching about service or food too. Don't bite the hand that feeds you. merica! Go figure...The tip that is.
